Package com.example.flexiMed.notifications.email

Class EmailRequest

java.lang.Object
com.example.flexiMed.notifications.email.EmailRequest
public class EmailRequest extends Object
Represents the request body for sending emails via the EmailController. This class encapsulates the necessary information to send an email, including the recipient's address, the email subject, the name of the Thymeleaf template to use for the email body, and any variables required by the template.
